Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO REAL PROPERTY TAXATION

Title: Relates to the taxation of certain lands in the city of Beacon and town of Fishkill in Dutchess county
Summary: Provides for the taxation of all lands owned by the state, exclusive of the improvements erected thereon by the state, in the city of Beacon and the town of Fishkill in Dutchess county.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to the taxation of certain lands in the city of Beacon and town of Fishkill in Dutchess county
